5 Network 3 Host
1 Network 2 Host

192.168.1.0 2^n-2=3 n=3 	8 artacak
255.255.255.00000|000
255.255.255.248 /29

192.168.1.40		1 Host for Network


192.168.1.40 2^n-2=2 n=2 	4 artacak
255.255.255.000000|00

Cost 10^8 / BW

10 MBit     [10^7]
100 MBit    [10^8]
1   GBit    [10^9]
10  GBit    [10^10]
Serial      [1544 KBit]
Loopback    [8*10^6 KBit]
